name: Galaxy Clash RPG - Commander of the Universe
name_original: Galaxy Clash RPG - Commander of the Universe
description:
”Attractive Graphics.”
”Challenging and Addictive levels.”
” Amazing Battleship with unique power and guns.”
___________________________________

Galactic Clash is a Real-time strategy game. People who like shooters will love this game too. This is bullet hell at its best. Place yourself on the frontier of war and fight bravely with the alien swarm. The galactic army of huntsman aliens is in our kingdom, we've been interlocked in the middle of a severe battle. With a giant armada of mother ships, they will try their best to destroy us. Your call is to fly with your elite sonic trooper team, run through the asteroid maze, and fight with them, you're our final defense. Become a pioneer!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Challenging Levels
Different Themes
Multiple levels
Play in an online world with thousands of players.
Overall Gameplay is static and linear.
Amazing Battleship with unique power and guns.
Conquer swarms of alien ships and be a legend.
Upgrade guns and collect mini ships for lite support
